channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Gettext override translations
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Gettext override translations

item.title: CVE-2022-3036|2024-08-03T01:00:08.564Z -- unknown -- gettext%20override%20translations
item.description: The Gettext override translations WordPress plugin before 2.0.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
